The residents of the Altai province may congratulate the PSB on the Father ' s Day of Defence.
23 January
19:50The Altai theatres and ensemble became participants in the 2024 All Russian Gastrol Programmes
19:15One of the largest printers The Altai province, thanks to State support, updated the equipment
18:50In Barnaul, Siberia's original tchakwondo in the Olympia version of WTF
18:07In Gosdum, they offered to confiscate property for discrediting the Russian army.
17:44The Bian enterprise will supply coil equipment to China
17:38In most of the Altai region, student sports clubs have emerged
17:34Members of the APCS are invited to provide the possibility of using the matcrapist immediately after the birth of the child.
17:23The people of the Altai region will be able to take advantage of the experience of the cologans of the Russian Federation
17:11Barnaul recognized the emergency house on the street of the Partyisan, which had cracks.
16:45"The poorest owners." An expert from SCH proposed to relocate Russians from their apartments to rental housing.
16:18Andrei Turchak: The PSB Working Group sent a first year report to the President
15:39Alty and Shereges are among the most popular places for a new year of rest within the country.
15:15Three people died in an accident in the Chui tract in Altai Krai
14:43Direct flights from Barnaul to Thailand will resume as of February
14:10960 long-term mothers in Altai Krai retired early in 2023
13:41Biyaska killed a teenager in an accident.
13:19The residents of the Altai province may congratulate the PSB on the Father ' s Day of Defence.
13:11At the Beloyar fortress in Novoaltysk, there was a fire again.
12:40The residents of the Altai region will be able to ask questions about the protection of their rights against creditors.
12:13In Altai province, students can give blood as part of the Donor Year Week.
11:37In Barnaul, the roadblocks process holoid troturas
11:13On 23 January, fire-fighting exercises took place in the Altai province
11:06APC discussed the possibility of reducing the tax burden on socially significant entrepreneurs
10:44China has experienced a serious earthquake in neighbouring countries
10:14Victor Tomenko gave the first inhabitants of the province an honourable sign, " In honour of the 80th anniversary of the total liberation of Leningrad from the fascist blockade "
09:46We've had a long time since the Dinamo-Altai final home series.
09:14The clear and freezing weather will continue on 23 January in the Altai province.
08:43The 698th special operation of the Russian Federation in Ukraine was completed. Main
08:18An exhibit on genocide during war was opened in the Altai Krajina Library
07:38Without " suspensions " : how to learn the volume of liquefied gas in the cylinder
07:15As Barnaul celebrates a handwriting day.
22 January
21:08In Barnaul, the house whose residents feared the destruction of the building was examined.
19:51Rubtsovian stole the bike by using the key left behind.
19:43Governor Victor Tomenko instructed officials to install heating in Slavgorod.
19:19In Barnaul, an up-to-date human resource centre for the Russian Robot has been opened.
18:47Obesity in Russia: new cases increased by 10 per cent
18:14The Altai Reserves conduct winter animal accounts
17:41Construction and HFC specialists from across the country met at the Russian exhibition
17:12In the Albanian cities, the black sky regime was extended until 25 January
16:51In Altai, housing certificates for orphaned children will be enhanced
16:12There were four illegal taxis caught in Zarinsk.
15:43Russian schoolchildren will remove social awareness from grade 6-7.
15:14Western scientists fear frozen in the ice of Siberia of ancient viruses
14:49Foreigners are detained in the Altai Customs for attempting to bribe US$ 1,000
14:25Several private sector fires have been eliminated in the Altai province in 24 hours.
Read the news.
